description.description: Ideas for everything from getting started, to taking your business to the next level.

posts.title: Tips for being extra safe on Monzo Business for web

description.text: For the times you prefer a bigger screen, here are a few tips to make sure your account stays secure.

posts.title: Monzo Business for web is here!

description.text: Businesses can now access their account from their computer or laptop.

posts.title: What support is available for the self-employed during coronavirus?

description.text: On 26th March 2020, the government announced the Self-employment Income Support Scheme (SEISS), a new initiative to support those who are self-employed throughout the coronavirus outbreak.

posts.title: What support is available for my small business during coronavirus?

description.text: The government has announced a range of initiatives to support small businesses throughout the coronavirus pandemic. We've outlined what's available to help you understand the best options for your business.

posts.title: Here's how the government is helping businesses through coronavirus

description.text: We know that if you're the owner or the employee of a small business, this might be a particularly difficult time for you. We've outlined some of the main points that came out of the Chancellor's speech.

posts.title: Introducing Monzo Business. It just works, so you can too ðŸ’¼

description.text: We've spent the last 12 months learning what you need from a business bank account. Today we're launching two business accounts, so you can pick the one that works best around your business.

posts.title: Do I need a business banking account?

description.text: We've outlined when you might set one up, what you'll need, and some of the benefits of a business bank account (like accounting and separating your finances).
